attributes.action: Recognise the 'reverse pivot' as an acceptable form of golf swing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise the 'reverse pivot' as an acceptable form of golf swing.Make all golf professionals use this swing thus creating a more evenly matched and competetive sport. Lets see Spotter and Mario cream a 3 wood 180 yds

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
